title: Off to Join the Circus
subtle: Personal Narrative (nonfiction), 844 words, Level O (Grade 2), Lexile 640L
description: Birdie is Off to Join the Circus! Follow along with Birdie as she prepares for the big show at circus camp. Students will enjoy an inside look into stilt walking, aerial silks, clowning, and more. Detailed photographs keep students engaged with the fun, unusual, and sometimes challenging activities.
